attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are looking to get a brand new indoor skate park in the crewe area. somewhere indoors to atract people from the area. Our Existing Skate park is too far away from the town. this will benefit crewe because it will get kids off the street

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
